title: Conduct a Procure-to-Pay Process Walkthrough
description: As part of a procurement audit, an auditor conducts a walkthrough of the process with a procurement specialist.

tasks.description: Prepare a list of questions for the walkthrough covering vendor selection, purchase order creation, and invoice approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive list of interview questions is prepared.

tasks.description: During the walkthrough, ask the specialist to demonstrate how a new vendor is set up in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor observes the process and identifies that no check is performed for duplicate vendors.

tasks.description: Request a sample of 25 new vendor setup forms for later testing.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal data request is logged and sent to the auditee.
